About us Contact us Join us

Canadian Armenian Alumni Association

Unifying platform for Armenian Alumni.

WHO ARE WE

We are a group of Armenian graduates from Canadian institutions hoping to provide a platform to those who have graduated and are looking for a safe place to come together without any consideration of political and social orientations.

Our Mission

We aim to provide a non-partisan inclusive platform for Canadian Armenian alumni to organize and participate in Armenian Plight initiatives, thus developing a spirit of community within the membership. assist and develop ASAâ€™s through all available resources, thus offering ASA constituents a transitory space upon becoming alumni.

Our Vision

A unified Armenian community --- where Canadian Armenian Alumni of diverse perspectives can apply their efforts towards the Armenian Plight in whichever project they believe in most while supporting all ASAâ€™s across Canada in the process

Our Values

Inclusivity

We pledge to respect other members regardless of their political affiliation, beliefs, gender, and sexual orientation. An open-minded mindset should be applied at all times among members.

Collaboration

We pledge to take the role of partners, advisors, and mentors when working with ASAâ€™s and Committee leaders.

Grassroots

We pledge to rely on and empower Canadian Armenian Alumni community voices, allowing them to be the primary driver of decision-making.
